title: Comparative genomics of two protozoans Dictyostelium discoideum and Plasmodium falciparum reveals conserved as well as distinct regulatory pathways crucial for exploring novel therapeutic targets for Malaria
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Shivam Nanda, Rajan Pandey, Rahila Sardar, Ashutosh Panda, Aruna Naorem, Dinesh Gupta, Pawan Malhotra
